column4: WHY the HELL did i ever decide to update my perfectly good firefox 1.04?!?!
YOUR head with a working firefox?
but now that i've started, my conscience tells me to finish the job
bacuase it's trying to interface with Apple products?
i heard that it's fixed, and something like "Alsa Mix"
contrary to popular beleif, Dillo is actaully slow as hell
your computer is supposed to be schizo, but it's not
OK, what am i doing wrong.
i did completel uninstalls of firefox, mozilla-firefox, and mozilla-firefox-gnome-support
